text: Late to this, but Steve and Edward both had similar traits in different forms.  Mainly they wanted to steer, often unrelated, conversations to fit their way of thinking.  It's still a little unclear to me what Steve wanted from the community even after all this.  I feel like people gave him good feedback based on what he shared
